distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for gnome-shell fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-3820: Fixed a partial lock screen bypass (bsc#1124493).
notes.title: Description of the patch

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Workstation Extension 15 SP1

notes.text: It was discovered that the gnome-shell lock screen since version 3.15.91 did not properly restrict all contextual actions. An attacker with physical access to a locked workstation could invoke certain keyboard shortcuts, and potentially other actions.
notes.title: CVE description
